Description: Reviewed by colleagues or team members for initial feedback.
Identified as requiring changes before further approval.
Approved by the immediate supervisor or team leader.
Checked by a quality control team for consistency and accuracy.
Assessed for compliance with relevant regulations or guidelines.
Reviewed and approved by a department or project manager.
Approved by senior leadership or final authority.
Reviewed and approved by an external client or stakeholder.
Officially released or deployed for use.
